title: MD
biography: Karl Wilhelm Lauterbach is a German scientist, physician, and politician of the Social Democratic Party of Germany (SPD), who served as Federal Minister of Health from 2021 to 2025. He is professor of health economics and epidemiology at the University of Cologne. Since the 2005 German federal election, he has been a member of the Bundestag.
aiSummary: Karl Lauterbach is a epidemiology specialist with an H-index of 28 at Federal Ministry of Health (Member). Has been published in The Lancet, Lancet (London, England). Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
